snippet.title: Twin Dragons Trailer - NES (PAL/NTSC US) New Edition | PixelHeart
snippet.description:
🐉Dinki and Minki, the Twin Dragons, leave peacefully with their parents on a remote island far away. The family is very happy as they are expecting new siblings to hatch out soon. But one day, while parents went hunting, the sorcerer from the pygmies village decides to steal the eggs in order to increase the powers of his community. 
It’s now on you to solve the situation. Embark on a quest to rescue the precious eggs. Travel the colourful island and use all your skills to defeat your enemies along this fascinating adventure. Collect red and green peppers to activate extra powers and throw mad dragon fireballs to fearless enemies and bosses.🐉

NEW EDITION - Limited to 1000 numbered copies +📜Certificate of authenticity Official game JoshProd / PixelHeart.
💳Available here:
➡️BUY: https://bit.ly/34AzfHE
